name: Shield Block
description:
reduces damage by $buff_amount_1$% and prevents crowd control effects.

Your damage increases by 15% for 5 seconds for each 150 damage taken while Blocking.

Taking more than 150 damage while Blocking increases damage by 15% for 5 seconds for each 150 damage taken while Blocking and activates Shield Bash.

This attack can be instantly Flash-Cast.
